name: Farhan Ahmed
bio: Python has been my go to language for more than a decade. It is a beautiful language and very versatile and has evolved rapidly in the last several years. My overall software design experience extends to a little over 2 decades in multiple industries including health care, fintech, and logistics.

name: Isaac Good
bio: I learned Python in 2013 and have been a heavy user ever since. I spend a lot of time writing, reviewing and mentoring Python, both professionally and personally. My other area of fascination is bash.
